system.type: Suffered Critical Wounds and left permenantly incapacitated. May have additional costs.
system.descriptor: The Mechanicus constructs a new body for the character and transfers their mind into it, this is rarely stable or safe. It is an rare and expensive process that leaves one a shadow of themselves, but now stronger.
system.uses: Much rarer and more expensive. The body is fully reconstructed, reroll Strength (30+2d10), Toughness (30+2d10), and Agility (15+2d10), lose advances in these skills and cannot improve without assistance of a skileld Magos. -1 Fate Point, Halve Fellowship, Lose any talents you no longer meet prerequisites for, gain 10+1d10 Insanity, Gain Talents: Autosanguine, Prosanguine, Chem Geld, Disturbing Voice, Resistance (Cold, Fear, Toxins). Gain an inbuilt rebreather, gain 2AP in all locations. Cannot be healed with Medicae skill, cannot swim. May have further implants, look visibly inhuman.
